text.0_Chapter, 5_Verse, 0_Comment: Son: He is obligated to honor his father, and likewise, a servant, his master. You are called "sons" and "servants." If then I be a father to you, where is the honor due to me?
text.0_Chapter, 5_Verse, 1_Comment: Saith the Lord to you: It is you, the priests, who despise my name.
text.0_Chapter, 5_Verse, 2_Comment: Wherein have we despised: That is to say, I knew that you would say, "Wherein have we despised You?" That is how you despised me.
